ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] A strange place to climb (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: no, shadowstep doesn t go through walls. (I tried it when I was stuck near Kaesora) ... From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@eds.com] Sent: Tuesday, October
ygData.messageBody:
no, shadowstep doesn't go through walls. (I tried it when I was stuck near
Kaesora)

-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 31, 2000 11:01 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] A strange place to climb (OT)


Would our shadowstep zap you out of karnors?

Minkin

-----Original Message-----
From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
Sent: October 31, 2000 10:34 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] A strange place to climb (OT)


you'll also notice that Karnor's itself is completely hollow. be careful,
cause if you get stuck inside, you'll need a GM to get you out.

I was messing around outside Kaesora one day when I decided to climb the
towers there. I ended up falling inside of one and getting stuck. I had to
convince our wizard to climb in after me and port us out. (what a pain.)

Draelon Stormsong

-----Original Message-----
From: Kenneth E. Bachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 31, 2000 3:41 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] A strange place to climb (OT)


A fast and amusing little climb is to end up on top of the sword of the
statue in front of Karnor's.
Also, if you use the 51 song and run full-tilt out of High Pass into the EK
ramp, you'll notice that those
really thick looking stone arches way up there above you are one-dimensional
from above! They're fake!
Stage scenery!

Nice job on the FV statue. Loved the page.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 54 songs, Innoruuk



Adam Wasserman wrote:

> I thought the view from the top of Kurn's tower was quite nice. Also the
top
> of the dwarf statue above Kaladim is scenic.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
> Sent: Monday, October 30, 2000 5:54 PM

used

>
> Minkin
>
> -----Original Message-----

> Subject: Re: [eqbards] A strange place to climb (OT)
>
> WOW! Very nice climb. Gives me something to strive for. So far, I've
been
> up the wizard spires, and the RV bank, but than I'm only 13th, so have a
> little while before I can attempt that one. Nice to know I'm not the only
> dare devil bard around. Everyone thinks I'm nuts, but hey, it's a great
> view up there. *smiles*
>
> Willowlark
> 13th Bard
> Karana Server
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Khelan
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Sent: Monday, October 30, 2000 10:44 AM
> Subject: [eqbards] A strange place to climb (OT)
>
> Well, I was slightly bored on Saturday, so I decided to climb the statue
> of Firiona Vie in FV. Anything that tall is just meant to be climbed :).
I
> don't think it would be possible to anyone not a Bard, but it may be
> possible. Visit http://www.clandlc.com/Firiona/ for screenshots and a
> description of how I did it.
>
> Hope a few of you try it yourself, it's a blast and a great view : )
>
> --Khelan
